description: A user account/login to access certain systems and/or services. Examples include okta-user, aws-iam-user, ssh-user, local-user (on a host), etc.

email.description: The primary email address associated with the user account

emailDomain.description: The domain portion of the email addresses associated with the user account.

shortLoginId.description: The shortened login Id. For example, if the username is the full email address (first.last@company.com), the shortLoginId would be the part before @ (first.last).

mfaEnabled.description: Specifies whether multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for this user.

mfaType.description: Specifies what type of multi-factor authentication (MFA) is being used by this user.

active.description: Specifies whether user account is active or disabled.

firstName.description: The user's official first name in the system (such as HR database)

lastName.description: The user's official last name in the system (such as HR database)

passwordChangedOn.description: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) of when the user's password was last rotated for this particular account.
